amendment.description: Amendment ensures that, under the Regulatory Flexibility Act, the requirement that each agency must annually publish a list of regulations to be reviewed pursuant to its periodic review plan, remains intact.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 113-361 to make a technical correction that ensures the current requirement, under the Regulatory Flexibility Act, that each agency annually publish a list of regulations to be reviewed pursuant to its periodic review plan, remains so.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Tipton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
